import MethodEndpoint from '@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint';
import ParamsDetails from '@theme/ParamsDetails';
import RequestSchema from '@theme/RequestSchema';
import StatusCodes from '@theme/StatusCodes';
import OperationTabs from '@theme/OperationTabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
import Heading from '@theme/Heading';

<Heading
  as={'h1'}
  className={'openapi__heading'}
  children={'Fetch all financial institutions'}
></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={'get'}
  path={'/accounts/{account_id}/financial-institutions'}
  context={'endpoint'}
></MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

Returns all financial institutions associated with the given account.

Deprecated. Use Addresses. Create an off-chain Address (ACH/Wire/RTP) and pass its `address_id` to Transfers. Plaid endpoints have moved to `/accounts/{account_id}/plaid/*`.

<Heading
  id={'request'}
  as={'h2'}
  className={'openapi-tabs__heading'}
  children={'Request'}
></Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[
    {
      name: 'account_id',
      in: 'path',
      required: true,
      schema: {
        title: 'Kusid',
        type: 'string',
        format: 'ksuid',
        pattern: '^[a-zA-Z0-9]{26}$',
        example: '2VcUIIsgARwVbEGlIYbhg6fGG57',
      },
      description: 'The ID of the account',
    },
  ]}
></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema title={'Body'} body={undefined}></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{
    '200': {
      description: 'A list of financial institutions',
      content: {
        '*/*': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              financial_institutions: {
                type: 'array',
                items: {
                  title: 'FinancialInstitution',
                  type: 'object',
                  properties: {
                    id: {
                      title: 'Kusid',
                      type: 'string',
                      format: 'ksuid',
                      pattern: '^[a-zA-Z0-9]{26}$',
                      example: '2VcUIIsgARwVbEGlIYbhg6fGG57',
                    },
                    name: { type: 'string', example: 'Business Checking Account' },
                    status: {
                      type: 'string',
                      enum: ['processing', 'active', 'archived'],
                      example: 'active',
                    },
                    bank_details: {
                      title: 'Bank',
                      type: 'object',
                      properties: {
                        owner: { type: 'string', example: 'Jane Doe' },
                        account_number: { type: 'string', example: '1234567890' },
                        routing_number: { type: 'string', example: 63108680 },
                        name: {
                          type: 'string',
                          description: 'The name of the bank',
                          example: 'Example Bank',
                        },
                        address: {
                          title: 'AccountAddress',
                          type: 'object',
                          properties: {
                            street_line_1: { type: 'string', example: '123 Main St' },
                            street_line_2: { type: 'string', example: 'Apt C' },
                            city: { type: 'string', example: 'Des Moines' },
                            state: { type: 'string', example: 'Iowa' },
                            zip: { type: 'string', example: '12345' },
                            country: { type: 'string', example: 'USA' },
                          },
                          required: ['street_line_1', 'city', 'state', 'zip', 'country'],
                        },
                        account_type: { type: 'string', example: 'checking' },
                      },
                      required: [
                        'owner',
                        'account_number',
                        'routing_number',
                        'name',
                        'account_type',
                      ],
                    },
                  },
                },
              },
            },
            title: 'GetFinancialInstitutionsResponse',
          },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></StatusCodes>
